narrative:
This was the first inspection of the new location for Site 001 of the Licensee.  There were no non-compliant items
identified at the time of the inspection.  The Licensee may conduct AWA regulated activities from the new location of
this site.
NOTE - Exit briefing held 5/24/17 on-site with Licensee. Report delivered by e-mail 5/26/17.
*END OF REPORT*
